subject: Football
College Athletics
Football (College)
organizations: Rutgers, The State University of New Jersey
lead_paragraph: Mohamed Sanu had 13 receptions for 129 yards, but the Scarlet Knights did not polish off Army and its elusive quarterback, Angel Santiago, until he was thwarted on a fourth-down option keeper.
